basics.label: Finance And Accounting Specialist
basics.summary: Diligent Office Administrative Assistant with 25 years of hands-on experience in performing front office duties. A creative problem-solver with outstanding critical thinking abilities. Capable of managing calendars, scheduling meetings, and taking initiative.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed all payments processing, invoicing and collections tasks. Improved communication efficiency as primary liaison between departments, clients and vendors.
highlights: Collaborated extensively with auditors during preliminary and year-end audit processes
Increased customer satisfaction by greeting visitors promptly and professionally

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Worked closely with managers to plan buys. Recommended optimal suppliers after qualifying vendors and evaluating proposals.
highlights: Directed transportation initiatives to maximize efficiency
Negotiated favorable contracts and determined lowest possible cost, factoring in quality and reliability, by analyzing data

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed the receptionist area, including greeting visitors and responding to telephone and in-person requests for information. Wrote reports and correspondence from dictation and handwritten notes. Dispersed incoming mail to correct recipients throughout the office.
highlights: Organized files, developed spreadsheets, faxed reports
Managed the day-to-day calendar for the company's senior director
